casebody.data:
TALCOTT, Respondent, v. LEVY et al., Appellants. (Superior Court of New York City,

General Term.

April 4, 1893.) Appeal from equity term. Action by James Talcott against Morris Levy, Rebecca Levy, and Mahlke ■Charmaek.

Argued before SEDGWICK, C. J„ and DUGRO and GILDERSLEEVE, JJ.

Ira Leo. Bamberger, for appellants. Carter, Pinney & Kellogg, for respondent. PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed, upon the opinion of the learned trial judge. 20 N. Y. Supp. 440.
